summary: this mod add the power of the dovahkiin to the player
descriptionHtml:
hello everyone im  your freind SKULL19971 and this is my second mod im so happy of creating this mod
this mod add the power of a real dovahkiin to the player this mod add so many shouts to the player not all skyrim shouts but the best of them but you must unloack them with a dragon sool also this mod add so many spells not all skyrim spells but the best of them also it add so many skills and abilities and the speed of your character will be double and the health will be verry long so normaly i dont know you health stamina magika is lvl 320 maybe now they will be 4320 itsent cool!!! i mean you can die but its almost impossible to die i mean now you can kill 20 dragon in the same time!!!! maybe you are lvl 12 or lvl 40 but you will have the power of someone with the lvl 255!!!!!
In this mod i dident retex anything and also i dident add new shouts or spells just the same old spells and shouts but now you have them all so  its not nessesary to learn it or buy it just when you activate this mod you will see that you become more stronger and you will see in your magic list that you have many new think THE POWER OF THE DOVAHKIIN !!!!
Enjoy your freind SKULL 19971 and once again im sorry with my bad english...
IMPORTENT : some people will not like that we have a verry long health they will like to be week normaly tgey will like to have only the power of the dovahkiin but without the big health other people will not like to have a speed thet like the normal speed so in my VERSION 1 i add the power of the dovahkiin + the big health + the speed
in VERSION 2 i did remove the big health
in VERSION 3 i did remove the SPEED
in VERSION 4 i did remove the speed and the health
ENJOY!!!
author: my others mod
